fixed_xml: <ITEM>Solte Jemand <BIBL><AUTHOR>Theophrasti</AUTHOR> <TITLE>Caracteres cum latina versione Angeli Politani</TITLE>, <PLACE>Basel.</PLACE> apud <PUBLISHER>Cvatandraum</PUBLISHER> <YEAR>1531</YEAR>. in <FORMAT>8v√≤.</FORMAT></BIBL> & <BIBL><AUTHOR>Petri Victorii</AUTHOR> <TITLE>Commentarius ad Aristotelis Rhetoricam</TITLE></BIBL> zu verkaufen haben, so beliebe man solche nebst dem a√ºssersten Preis ins Berichthaus zu senden.</ITEM>
explanation: The XML tag 'apuia' is not a standard XML tag. It seems to be a typo and was replaced with 'apud', which means 'published by' in Latin. This makes sense in the context, as it is followed by the publisher's name.
